titleStmt.title: A letter from a person of quality to an eminent dissenter to rectifie his mistakes concerning the succession, the nature of persecution and a comprehension.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, George, 1642-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for Randolph Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Hickes by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"A reissue of the sheets of: The judgment of an anonymous writer, 1684, with the title-page and Clavel's preface cancelled and a new title-page substituted:--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
